page.title: 19MUSLIM FAMILY EVENING
page.content: My name is Fatima Bibi. I come from a family of eight. When I come from school I do not eat anything. When my dad comes home from work he sits down to read and when it is seven o'clock he goes upstairs to pray. My mum who is sewing goes to pray, then she reads the Koran. I go to pray after my parents. When I read the Koran I read half a chapter in an hour. The fast is broken by drinking water or eating fruit. My mum cooks dinner at nine o'clock, then my parents go to pray for the fourth time. My dad goes to the mosque. At eleven thirty the fifth and final prayer takes place. At one forty my mum makes tea and toast. After we have eaten we then go to bed. The process starts again.
